description: Gaussian binomial coefficient [ n,3 ] for q=-3.
references: J. Goldman and G.-C. Rota, The number of subspaces of a vector space, pp. 75-83 of W. T. Tutte, editor, Recent Progress in Combinatorics. Academic Press, NY, 1969.
I. P. Goulden and D. M. Jackson, Combinatorial Enumeration. Wiley, NY, 1983, p, 99.
M. Sved, Gaussians and binomials, Ars. Combinatoria, 17A (1984), 325-351.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 3..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-20,210,540,-729).
prog: (Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,3,-3) for n in xrange(3,19)] # [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 27 2009](MAGMA) [(-1+7*3^(2*n-3)+(-1)^n*3^(n-2)*(7-3^(2*n-1)))/896: n in [3..18]]; // _Bruno Berselli_, Oct 29 2012(Maxima) makelist(coeff(taylor(1/((1-x)*(1+3*x)*(1-9*x)*(1+27*x)), x, 0, n), x, n), n, 0, 15); [_Bruno Berselli_, Oct 29 2012]
author: _Olivier GÃ©rard_
